mapper.insert: insert into car(car_code, car_name, car_inc, car_size, car_trans, car_type, car_img) values(#{carCode}, #{carName},#{carInc}, #{carSize}, #{carTrans}, #{carType}, #{carImg})
mapper.update: update car set car_code=#{carCode}, car_name=#{carName}, car_inc=#{carInc}, car_size=#{carSize}, car_trans=#{carTrans}, car_type=#{carType}, car_img=#{carImg}, where car_code=#{carCode}
